item.title: Episode 467: Adam McKay is Irredeemable and Other News
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: The Sci-Fi Christian – 5/12/16 “The Sci-Fi Christian: Adam McKay is Irredeemable and Other News” featuring Matt Anderson and Ben […]
item.content:encoded:
The Sci-Fi Christian – 5/12/16 “The Sci-Fi Christian: Adam McKay is Irredeemable and Other News” featuring Matt Anderson and Ben De Bono

We have mostly movie updates in this week’s news episode.

Donate to help the Water Fund here: https://www.onedayswages.org/thescifichristian?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss
